articles.author: Molly Edwards
articles.title: Kit Harington has bad news about his Game of Thrones and MCU futures - Gamesradar
articles.description: Kit Harington has given disappointing updates
articles.content:
Kit Harington has given some pretty disappointing updates about his future in the Game of Thrones and MCU universes. 
News broke in 2022 that a Jon Snow spin-off show was in development, which would… [+1515 chars]
